title: 820-01041 boot ok, no 20v
message:
i repaired the motherboard where i found a shorted capacitor on PPBUS.After replacement the machine turns on but when i connect the power supply, it does not switch to 20v and does not charge.
Voltages are ok, firmware is ok
Can you help me
Thanks

title: 820-01041 boot ok, no 20v
message: I have 5 macbook with the same problem

title: 820-01041 boot ok, no 20v
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

What is the exact PPBUS_G3H voltage with charger alone (without battery)?
All USB-C ports have the same behavior?
Just in case, see if DFU helps.

Did you try another charger?
New battery data cable?
Did PRAM reset?

title: 820-01041 boot ok, no 20v
message:
Hi
I have checked the following voltages with no battery connected.
All ports USB-C have same behavior.
Voltage:

PP3V3_G3H_RTC_X -> 3,38V
PP3V3_UPC_XA_LDO -> 3,35V
PPBUS_G3H->12,31V

With oscilloscope i have checked activity on the line USBC_XA_CC1,USBC_XA_CC2.
Macbook start and work normaly.
I did PRAM reset.
I replaced charger.
....but not charge battery

Now try to change charger...

title: 820-01041 boot ok, no 20v
message: I can replace all USB-C controller CD3215C00

title: 820-01041 boot ok, no 20v
message:
PPBUS_G3H has incorrect voltage, like SMC (T2) doesn't control it.
Try DFU revive first...
